name: Elly POS Pay
author: Eligma Ltd.

sections.description:
The Elly POS extension equips your online store with the widest selection of payment methods from all major payment card providers, digital payment solutions and cryptocurrency payments powered by GoCrypto.

Over 65% of the world’s population prefer digital payments, so do not miss your chance to accept all trending payment methods in one place. All the major payment cards will help you retain your traditional customers. Digital payment solutions attract younger generations, while cryptocurrency payments open up your online store to a new customer base of more than 40M people through the GoCrypto network.

This extensive list of payment options will attract new generations of customers and significantly decrease cart abandonment in your online store. The Elly POS extension will make your online store stand out from the competition. Widen your payment method offer and start getting more traction today.

Web Payments API Support

Elly POS Pay includes Web Payments API support, which means customers can pay using payment details associated to their mobile devices, in browsers supporting the Web Payments API (Chrome for Android, amongst others).
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic installation of the Elly POS Pay plugin follow these steps:
1. Log in to WordPress admin.
2. Go to Plugins > Add New.
3. Search for the Elly POS Pay plugin.
4. Click on Install Now, wait until the plugin is installed successfully and click on Activate.

Setup

To set up the Elly POS Pay you need to have an account. If you do not have an account yet please contact us on info@ellypos.si. Follow the steps below to connect the plugin to your account:
1. After you have activated the Elly POS Pay plugin, go to WooCommerce > Settings.
2. Click the Payments tab.
3. Enter the Host, OTP and Terminal ID that you received on your email address.
4. Click Save changes.
